scripts.generate:parser: antlr-ng -Dlanguage=TypeScript -o parser/v2/generated -l false -v true grammar/v2/PineScriptLexer.g4 grammar/v2/PineScriptParser.g4 && node scripts/patch-visitor.js
scripts.test: node --import tsx --test tests/v2/lexer/lexer.test.ts tests/v2/parser/parser.test.ts tests/v2/transpiler/transpiler.test.ts tests/v2/ta/ta.test.ts
